ARABIC: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُوا۟ فَفِى ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِيرٌ وَشَهِيقٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those who are wretched, they will be in the Fire, where they will sigh and gasp,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who are doomed, will be in Hell: For them will be sighing and sobbing,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for the wretched, they shall be in the Fire, and in it they shall sigh and groan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The condemned ones will live in hell fire, sighing and groaning
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So those who are ill-fated, are in the fire – they will bray like donkeys in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: As for those who are wretched, they will be in the Fire, in it they will experience Zafir and Shahiq.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So as to those who are unhappy, they shall be in the fire; for them shall be sighing and groaning in it:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: As for the wretched, they shall be in the Fire, wherein there shall be for them moaning and sighing, therein dwelling forever,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: As for those who will be wretched (on that day) they will be in the Fire; sighing and wailing will be their portion therein,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The wretched ones will be in the Fire sighing and groaning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: As for those who shall be wretched. they shall be in the Fire, wherein for them shall be panting and roaring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As for the wretched, they shall be in the Fire: their lot therein will be groaning and wailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who are wretched shall be in the Fire: There will be for them therein (nothing but) the heaving of sighs and sobs:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: As for those who are wretched, they will be in the Fire, sighing in a high and low tone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The wretched shall be (cast) in the Fire where they will moan and sigh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for those who are miserable, they will be in the Fire. They will have therein sighing and wailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: As for those who were [destined to be] wretched, they will be in the Fire. For them therein is [violent] exhaling and inhaling.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:106] As for those who are damned, according to God’s [prior] knowledge, they will be in the Fire; their lot therein will be wailing, which is a loud sound, and sighing, which is a faint sound;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (As for those who will be wretched (on that day) they will be in the Fire; sighing) like the sighing heard from a donkey when about to bray (and wailing) like the exhaling of a donkey when he stops braying (will be their portion therein).
